text: Harold M. Bernson, known as Hal Bernson, (November 19, 1930 - July 20, 2020) was an American politician and clothier businessman. He was born in South Gate, California. Bernson was a member of the Los Angeles City Council between 1979 to 2003. He was a member of the Republican Party. Bernson died on July 20, 2020 in Los Angeles, aged 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
